mapper.select: SELECT permissions.permission_id AS permission_id, permissions.permissions_name AS permissions_name, permissions.permissions_key AS permissions_key, permissions.create_time AS create_time, permissions.update_time AS update_time, permissions.create_by AS create_by, permissions.update_by AS update_by, permissions.remark AS remark FROM sys_permissions permissions JOIN sys_role_permissions role_permissions ON permissions.permission_id = role_permissions.permission_id JOIN sys_role ON role_permissions.role_id = sys_role.role_id WHERE sys_role.role_key = #{roleName}

SELECT permissions.permission_id AS permission_id, permissions.permissions_name AS permissions_name, permissions.permissions_key AS permissions_key, permissions.create_time AS create_time, permissions.update_time AS update_time, permissions.create_by AS create_by, permissions.update_by AS update_by, permissions.remark AS remark FROM sys_permissions permissions JOIN sys_user_role role_permissions join sys_role_permissions on permissions.permission_id = sys_role_permissions.permission_id join sys_user_role where sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId}
